caption.title: The relationship between hemorrhagic fever with renal syndrome (HFRS) incidence, Norway rat population density and environmental variables with time lags.
caption.p: (A) Cross-correlations between the population density of Norway rats and the climate variables. (B) Cross-correlations between HFRS and climate variables. TM, monthly mean temperature; TMAX, monthly mean maximum temperature; TMIN, monthly mean minimum temperature; PREC, monthly cumulative precipitation; RH, monthly mean relative humidity; AH, monthly mean absolutely humidity; RN.(t), Norway rat population density at time t; IN.(t), HFRS incidence at time t.
Click here for additional data file.
